summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hypd Games Supabase Storage integration. All features working correctly: Game feed loads with Supabase Storage URLs, thumbnails display correctly, game player serves content from Supabase, admin upload form has all required fields, bottom navigation is clickable.
passed_tests: Backend API: Health check (PostgreSQL connected)
Backend API: Games list returns 5 games
Backend API: Test Clicker Game has Supabase Storage URLs for thumbnail and game file
Backend API: Thumbnail accessible from Supabase Storage (HTTP 200)
Backend API: Game play endpoint returns HTML content directly (avoids CSP issues)
Backend API: Game play increments play count
Backend API: Game meta endpoint for SEO
Backend API: Admin login with admin@hypd.games credentials
Backend API: Admin games endpoint requires authentication
Backend API: Admin can get all games
Backend API: Admin can toggle game visibility
Backend API: Categories endpoint returns game categories
Backend API: Analytics overview endpoint
Frontend: Game feed loads with games from API
Frontend: Game thumbnails display from Supabase Storage URLs
Frontend: PLAY NOW button visible and clickable
Frontend: Game player page loads and displays game content in iframe
Frontend: Back button visible and clickable on game player
Frontend: Bottom navigation displays all 4 tabs (Feed, Explore, PRO, Profile)
Frontend: All navigation tabs are clickable and navigate correctly
Frontend: Admin Dashboard accessible after login
Frontend: Admin Upload tab has form with title, description, category, preview type, thumbnail upload, game zip upload
Frontend: Explore page shows search, category filters, and game cards
seed_data_creation: Test Clicker Game (ID: 4cf4c465-5d9a-4e32-8e9f-4e58afe58613) was uploaded with Supabase Storage integration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Supabase Storage integration fully tested and working: 1) Game thumbnails stored in 'game-thumbnails' bucket and accessible via public URLs. 2) Game HTML files stored in 'games' bucket. 3) The /api/games/{id}/play endpoint downloads content from Supabase and serves it directly as HTML to avoid CSP issues. 4) Admin upload form uploads files to Supabase Storage. 5) Test Clicker Game (ID: 4cf4c465-5d9a-4e32-8e9f-4e58afe58613) is the test game with Supabase Storage URLs. Admin credentials: admin@hypd.games / admin123
